name: Kürbisflipper
description:
Kürbisflipper 🎃

"Kürbisflipper" is a flipper game themed for halloween.

Get the pumpkin ball into the stations and let the goblins do the carving of face, eyes, nose and especially put in a candle.

Part of https://itch.io/jam/game-jam-saar-spooktacular-2021

Controls
  • R = Restart
  • Left Shift, Right Shift = Paddles / Flippers
  • Space = Tilt table
Credits
  • Programming: Benedikt Gillenberg ( bnmn ), Jasmin Pfeiffer
  • 3D Modelling: Tobias Borns, Alexander Peifer
  • Character Modelling & Animation: Felix Borns ( Goblins ), Sebastian Krause ( Pumpkin Man, animated in Cascadeur )
  • Sound: Teflora
